remarks: Transfer a reverse distributive law to the function operation. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2014.)
statement:
caofdi.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
caofdi.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> K ) $.
caofdi.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> S ) $.
caofdi.4 $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> S ) $.
caofdir.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. K ) ) -> ( ( x R y ) T z ) = ( ( x T z ) O ( y T z ) ) ) $.
caofdir $p |- ( ph -> ( ( G oF R H ) oF T F ) = ( ( G oF T F ) oF O ( H oF T F ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d O x y z $.
$d R x y z $.

$d T x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
